title: Why Your Flight Attendant Hates You
description: "Why Your Flight Attendant Hates You" is a humorous inside peek into what the flight attendant job is entails. Details include what frustrates flight attendants, frustrate passengers, and the causes of common disruptions in the air. Details are also provided about what your flight attendant has the power to do, and what they don't have the power to do. The author lets you know, in a comedic manner, why you are not allowed to do certain things while flying, and what behaviors are truly frowned upon.
author: Morgan Carver Richards
